text: aṅṅane nam'muṭe kalpana varikayuṁ aṭupp uṟavapeāṭṭi oḻukukayuṁ ceytappēāḷ nāṁ paṟaññu: ellā vargattil ninnuṁ raṇṭ iṇakaḷe vītavuṁ, ninṟe kuṭumbāṅgaṅṅaḷeyuṁ atil kayaṟṟikeāḷḷuka. (avaruṭe kūṭṭattil ninn‌) ārkketiril (śikṣayuṭe) vacanaṁ munkūṭṭi uṇṭāyiṭṭuṇṭēā avareāḻike. viśvasiccavareyuṁ (kayaṟṟikeāḷḷuka.) addēhattēāṭeāppaṁ kuṟacc pērallāte viśvasicciṭṭuṇṭāyirunnilla
